role.description: This Role is the default Role for basic functionality with less privileges
This Role enables access to HIV clinic data for patient
This Role enables access to OPD clinic data for patient
This Role enables access to MCH clinic data for patient
This Role enables access to TB clinic data for patient
This Role is for reception. Registration of patient and checking of patient is assigned to this role
This Role is for reception. Registration of patient and checking of patient is assigned to this role
This is a person role which allows access to clinical function
This role allows access to Laboratory function
This role allows access to Pharmacy function
This is the Base reporting role. It offers only aggregate reports to a user with this role
This role enables a user to access general reports and HIV specific reports.
This role enables a user to access general reporting and OPD specific reports
This role enables a user access general reporting and EID Specific reports
This role enables a user access general reports and MCH Specific reports
This role enables a user access general reports and SMC Specific reports
This role enables a user access general reports and TB Specific reports
This role enables a user access general reports and HTS Specific reports
This is the over all data manager role. It enables one to access all reports in the system
This is the over all data manager role. It enables one to access all reports in the system
